attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. THE SECOND I DOWNLOADED IT MY SYMPTOMS BEGAN. WENT TO GO GET IT CHECKED OUT AND TURNS OUT IT GAVE ME CHLAMYDIA. I REPEAT DO NOT. DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
attributes.title: This App gave my Chlamydia

attributes.review: the app is racist and homophobic
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: The fact that apple even allows such an app on its platforms STILL, is completely mind boggling to me. Anything that has Trumps name on it, Trumps brand, or ideology, should be taken down IMMEDIATELY!! Including this app. What your essentially doing is allowing extreme radical racists to gather on a platform and retain more information from this yoke the joke...this yuckko the clowns. By allowing this on your platform, essentially you’re showing your support for a fascist wannabe Hitler. Silence in violence. Compliance is violence. No justice, No peace. Take it to the streets, defund the police. No Justice! No Peace! End qualified Immunity and say all of their names: Tamir Rice. Emmet Till. Rayshard Brookes. Marsha Riot. Robert Fuller.
